text: Visited on 21 January 8.30pm. Writing this review for the cashier lady whom assisted me on finding an item (Centella) which is only carried in another store. Such a pleasant customer service provided with friendliness. Also a great pharmacy location in Anchorvale Village as I stay nearby.
Empty store manned by a foreign staff and we have to knock on the locked staff door to request for payment. Lousy experience be to served by a rude and grouchy staff today.

My partner was so excited to know Guardian to be available in Anchorvale Village. We no longer need to purposely travel to other mall just to get some necessities from pharmacy. This is a good news for residents surrounding and SengKang West.
Guardian is relatively empty on weekdays and have low foot traffic, not sure if they'll survive the rental fees. A decent variety of products.
